item.title: How do I make myself an admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @mod1 mod
item.description:
@mod1 wrote:

I can tell u how if ur using testcape(cheezescape) search for admin, untill you find a list of people names looks like this

[code]
/start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“nvi ible”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“albel nox”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“roooony”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“base”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pwnzor69”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“smitty”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“stoned4life1”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lemonslayer”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“inuyasha”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“bdawgx”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“k k kwarlord”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“juggalo269”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}[/code]

then change those names to either nothin in them or ur mods=1 admins=2 and owners=3

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make myself an admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ok… not sure if this will work for your source. Log out on the file you want admin on, go to your character folder, then click on your characters name and search for

character-rights

And change the 0 to 3

Mod - 1 Admin - 2 Staff - 3

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make myself an admin on my server?
item.dc:creator: @markwood111 markwood111
item.description:
@markwood111 wrote:

go into the characters section, double click on ur charachters name and change the right to 3 which is owner, 2 is admin and 1 is mod and 0 is normal player
